content:
TITLE: Building and Running Docker Compose for OpenTelemetry Demo
DESCRIPTION: Docker commands to build and start the OpenTelemetry demonstration environment with all necessary observability components including Grafana, Loki, Prometheus and Jaeger.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dometrain/from-zero-to-hero-open-telemetry-in-dotnet/blob/main/section-11/start/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker-compose build
docker-compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Running the OpenTelemetry Demo with Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Docker commands for building and running the OpenTelemetry demo project with all its supporting services. These commands will set up the entire observability stack including Grafana, Jaeger, and Prometheus.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dometrain/from-zero-to-hero-open-telemetry-in-dotnet/blob/main/section-12/start/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker-compose build
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker-compose up
```

----------------------------------------

LANGUAGE: bash
